title: Nvidia AI chip sales to China stalled by US security review, FT reports
title_zh: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英伟达人工智能芯片对华销售因美国安全审查而陷入停滞
summary: Nvidia's H200 AI chip sales to China remain in limbo nearly two months after U.S. ​President Donald Trump approved exports, pending a U.S. national ‌security review, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the ‌discussions.
summary_zh: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，在美国总统唐纳德·特朗普批准出口后近两个月，英伟达对中国的 H200 人工智能芯片销售仍处于悬而未决的状态，等待美国国家安全审查。

title: Asia shares wobble, oil prices climb and gold makes a comeback
title_zh: 亚洲股市波动，油价攀升，黄金卷土重来
summary: By Rae Wee SINGAPORE, Feb 4 - Asian stocks were on shaky ground on Wednesday, following steep losses in U.S. and European equities on fears that advancements in artificial intelligence could supplant
summary_zh: 作者：Rae Wee 新加坡，2 月 4 日 - 由于担心人工智能的进步可能取代美国和欧洲股市，亚洲股市周三表现不稳定。

title: Wall Street ends sharply down as traders fret about AI disruption
title_zh: 由于交易员担心人工智能的干扰，华尔街收盘大幅下跌
summary: STORY: Wall Street ended lower on Tuesday, with the Dow dropping about a third of a percent, the S&P 500 shedding more than eight-tenths of a percent and the Nasdaq losing more than 1.4%.Investors worried about AI creating more competition for software makers, keeping them on ...
summary_zh: 故事：华尔街周二收盘走低，道琼斯指数下跌约三分之一，标准普尔 500 指数下跌超过十分之八，纳斯达克指数下跌超过 1.4%。投资者担心人工智能会给软件制造商带来更多竞争，让他们继续...

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures mostly slip as AMD's slide adds to AI malaise ahead of Google earnings
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克期货大多下跌，因为 AMD 的下跌加剧了谷歌财报之前人工智能的萎靡不振
summary: Wall Street is seeing investors turn away from AI darlings toward safer investments after a rout in the sector led to losses across major gauges.
summary_zh: 在该行业的溃败导致主要指标出现亏损后，华尔街看到投资者从人工智能宠儿转向更安全的投资。

title: Nvidia nears deal to invest $20 billion in OpenAI funding round, source says
title_zh: 消息人士称，英伟达即将在 OpenAI 融资轮中投资 200 亿美元
summary: Nvidia is nearing a deal to invest roughly $20 billion in OpenAI as part of its latest funding round, ​a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.
summary_zh: 一位知情人士周二告诉路透社，作为最新一轮融资的一部分，Nvidia 即将达成协议，向 OpenAI 投资约 200 亿美元。

title: PepsiCo CEO reveals how he is tackling weight-loss drugs and consumer affordability challenges
title_zh: 百事公司首席执行官透露他如何应对减肥药和消费者负担能力的挑战
summary: PepsiCo CEO Ramon Laguarta weighs on key stock-moving ingredients.
summary_zh: 百事可乐首席执行官拉蒙·拉瓜塔（Ramon Laguarta）对影响库存的关键成分进行了权衡。

title: M&A sentiment is at a 6-year high. Here's why.
title_zh: 并购情绪创六年新高。原因如下。
summary: After a long period of stalled dealmaking, M&A sentiment is now at a six-year high. Citizens head of commercial banking Ted Swimmer sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain what's restoring confidence in initial public offering (IPO) and M&A activity.
summary_zh: 经过长时间的交易停滞后，并购情绪目前处于六年来的最高点。 Citizens 商业银行业务主管 Ted Swimmer 与 Market Catalysts 主持人 Julie Hyman 坐下来解释是什么在恢复人们对首次公开募股 (IPO) 和并购活动的信心。

title: Alphabet set to report Q4 earnings in test of stock's rally amid Google's AI wins
title_zh: Alphabet 将公布第四季度财报，以测试谷歌人工智能获胜后股价上涨
summary: Google parent Alphabet will report fourth quarter financial results after the bell on Wednesday.
summary_zh: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 将在周三盘后公布第四季度财务业绩。

title: Stock market today: Dow, Nasdaq, S&P 500 sink as tech falters amid flood of earnings
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、纳斯达克指数和标准普尔 500 指数下跌，因科技股在大量盈利中表现不佳
summary: Stocks are leaning higher following a strong start to February trade.
summary_zh: 继二月份交易强劲开局后，股市走高。
